title: Pogačar, Alaphilippe, and Top North Americans Headline Star-Studded Lineup in Québec and Montréal
content:
North America's only WorldTour stops are drawing an elite field that includes a fleet of US and Canadian stars.

Read the full article at Pogačar, Alaphilippe, and Top North Americans Headline Star-Studded Lineup in Québec and Montréal on Velo.
author: ahood
